metadata.title: CVE-2020-11888 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: python-markdown2 through 2.3.8 allows XSS because element names aremishandled unless a \w+ match succeeds. For example, an attack might useelementname@ or elementname- with an onclick attribute.

criterions.comment: python-markdown2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
